MEET

iCarbon

The app that tracks your carbon footprint as you go about your day. Creating a greener planet, one footprint at a time.

THE PAST

2 million years ago, the earth was in a good shape.

Trees were growing, animals roamed freely. There was no pollution, global warming or deforestation. The sky was clean and so were the oceans.

THE PRESENT

Technology defines our world today.

Technology may contribute to a comfortable life, however what we see is just the tip of the iceberg: Irresponsible use of modern technology contribute to global warming, pushing humanity to the bring of environmental destruction. We need to step up!

THE FUTURE

The app that will shape your future by assisting you to make more sustainable choices throughout the day

To fix our planet, all of us need to contribute, even the smallest change can help affect change. iCarbon tracks your carbon footprint and motivates you to reach better numbers than you did the day before.




  • Miles driven in car


    • Enable location services and iCarbon can distinguish whether you are travelling by car or if you are using sustainable means of travelling (bike, subway).


  • Utilities (connect iCarbon to your home device)


    • Connect iCarbon to your home device and track electricity and water usage!
